textBeforeTable: How does the Hyatt Gold Passport promotion work? First, join Hyatt Gold Passport today. If you are a current member, please register to participate at goldpassport.com/possibilities. Then, after every three eligible nights, up to 45 eligible nights, you stay at Hyatt from March 1, 2013 through May 31, 2013, you will earn cumulative bonus points. Please reference the chart below. What are the qualifying stay dates of the promotion? The promotion period for earning points begins March 1, 2013 and ends on May 31, 2013. back to top What are the qualifying registration dates of the promotion? From February 15, 2013 through April 30, 2013, current members may visit www.goldpassport.com/possibilities to complete registration into the promotion. New members will automatically be registered for the promotion upon enrollment in Hyatt Gold Passport from February 15, 2013 through April 30, 2013. Registration will be closed after April 30, 2012. back to top How do I participate? To participate, you must be a Hyatt Gold Passport® member. Join Hyatt Gold Passport today. New members who enroll in Hyatt Gold Passport from February 15, 2013 through April 30, 2013, will automatically be registered for the promotion. Current members
textAfterTable: Be sure to provide your Hyatt Gold Passport membership number when making reservations and at check-in. back to top Do the three (3) nights have to be consecutive? No. The required nights do not need to be consecutive. We will track your eligible nights and once the stay qualifications have been met, your bonus points will be posted to your Hyatt Gold Passport account. Please allow 2 – 3 weeks after your 3rd eligible night for bonus points to be posted to your Hyatt Gold Passport account (allow 4 – 6 weeks for bonus points from nights outside the U.S.). back to top How many bonus points can I earn? You can earn up to 45,000 Hyatt Gold Passport bonus points with this promotion. back to top What is considered an Eligible Night? For the purpose of this Offer, an “Eligible Night” shall be defined as one (1) night at any participating hotel or resort when choosing points or miles and paying an Eligible Rate. back to top What is an Eligible Rate? For the purpose of this Promotion, an "Eligible Rate" shall be defined
